data.text: @Medic_Russell Do as you please! But part of winning the pandemic is not needing a mask anymore. Not that we really won, we kind of lost really! 🙈👀👍

@codetholdory @Medic_Russell @CatRapscallion You should buy 5-7, rotate them, and have a specific one for each day of the week. Hang them up to air dry for a week and any germs will disappear. Wear each mask 5 times. Saw this in a German study.
@Medic_Russell Got called a bedwetter for wearing on on the Circle Line last week
@jossie74 @crossjacktar @Medic_Russell @CockertonMark I'm upgrading before I leave the house again... still basically Shielding, only go out once a month...

@ClareQ12 @Medic_Russell I've not had a single infection in 2 years. I basically have no immune system & usually catch everything that's going round. I'm wearing a mask long-term, it's done me the world of good!
@Medic_Russell Please upgrade your mask to an FFP2 to protect yourself and your patients.
@Medic_Russell Stay safe and thank you - I have COVID having been on call all week following PPE rules - it is REALLY NOT OVER

@Medic_Russell @de_prudhoe People seem to think that they can simply choose to go back to "normal". It doesn't work like that. As depressing as it is, the old normal has gone. Keep masking indoors, keep setting a good example to those around you. Burying our heads in the sand will help no one.

@Medic_Russell Unfortunately true; ad hoc political decisions underway
We have not set data-based triggers
Example (hypothetical for discussion)
5 days above 100 COVID hospital admissions will trigger X
Then 5 days below 100 COVID hospital admission will trigger withdrawing X
@Medic_Russell Spain have the right attitude to mask wearing. Just back and saw 100% compliance on buses with not one sunflower lanyard.
